title: Id these fonts used for 80s t-shirt
author: alexparke

comments.content:
ROCK LORDS: [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160734/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/arial)?  
EIGHTIES CHILD/GORDON STRACHAM/QUALITY CONTROLS/MOUZERS/Spork: [Bookman ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160734/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman)  
HULK RULES: [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160734/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Impact)
... and a lot of Cooper Black.
